description:
Breathable for outdoor excursions, stylish for après existence. Quick-drying fabric with a bit of stretch won't get bogged down with moisture when becoming one with nature.

  • Repreve® recycled polyester and spandex has a comfortable stretch and dries quickly
  • Quarter zip provides ventilation, and the wicking fabric moves sweat away from your body
  • High collar keeps chilly winds off your neck
  • Secure zip pocket with a key clip
  • Polygiene™ antimicrobial treatment resists odour build-up
  • Slim cuffs and adjustable hem seal warmth in
  • Relaxed fit has casual, all day comfort
name: Kathmandu WDN Play Quarter Zip Pullover - Women's
